markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Delve Scale](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1913)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 47 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 155 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104))</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

If fried, cast-off scales of a [benthic worm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2872) render into crunchy snacks. [Alchemists](/Classes.aspx?ID=56) add reagents to the frying oil to enhance the scales’ properties and flavor. For 1 minute after eating a delve scale, you gain a burrow Speed of 15 feet and a +2 item bonus to [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) checks to [High Jump](/Actions.aspx?ID=36) or [Long Jump](/Actions.aspx?ID=37).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Delve Scale
